stories.original: Couldn’t get this meme out of my head while reading Benoist‘s letter about SM.
stories.condensed: Benoist's latest letter sparks a cosmic meme frenzy—can’t shake it off like space dust in the wind!

stories.original: Thanks to the citizens that taught me how to take screenshots and not use my phone like a savage
stories.condensed: "Shoutout to our amazing citizens for upgrading my screenshot game—no more savage phone pics, just pure space beauty captured!"

stories.original: Current favorite game loop: Pyro maintenance technician
stories.condensed: "Gear up, pilots! The hottest game loop right now is becoming a Pyro maintenance technician—get ready to haul some serious repair action!"
"Get ready to hit the stars—it's the perfect time for your next haul in Star Citizen!"

stories.original: Are they going to make these bins functional?
stories.condensed: "Get ready to haul, folks! Rumor has it the new bins might be going operational soon!"
Get ready to blast off with "Jasmine," the latest spacecraft making waves in the Star Citizen universe—your next interstellar adventure awaits!

stories.original: Star Citizen has and is changing
stories.condensed: "Star Citizen is blasting off with exciting changes, transforming the universe like never before!"

stories.original: I just got the game and this happened.
stories.condensed: "New player just blasted off into the verse—buckle up, adventure awaits!"
Get ready to haul in style with Drake's bold new "Black & Yellow" paintjob—your ship's about to shine brighter than a supernova!

stories.original: I've done my part. What about you?
stories.condensed: "Join the crew and do your part in the Star Citizen universe—let's haul some responsibility together!"

stories.original: Most awesome Star Citizen session ever
stories.condensed: “Buckle up, space truckers—this is the most stellar Star Citizen session ever! Let’s ignite those thrusters!”

stories.original: Favourite aircraft compared to SC ships.
stories.condensed: Get ready to launch into nostalgia as we compare your favorite aircraft to the stellar ships of Star Citizen!
"Check your fit and make sure your loadout's ready to haul through the stars like a pro!"

stories.original: TenPoundFortyTwo’s EXCELLENT video on the new graphics performance and options
stories.condensed: "Check out TenPoundFortyTwo’s stellar video on the latest graphics performance upgrades—your visuals are about to take off!"

stories.original: A general list of recommended settings for maximum FPS and visual quality
stories.condensed: Boost your Star Citizen experience with our top settings for stellar FPS and jaw-dropping visuals—get ready to haul through the verse like never before!
